column3: 2015 condolences service information candles symbolic gestures photos memories share this tribute add memory add condolence of tyler james henry. tyler james henry
column8: 2015 at ruby memorial hospital. he was born in deer creek
column11: the son of sherry (nowlin) henry of cross lanes
column12: wv and steve henry and step-mother loretta of st. paul
column14: he was a gifted musician who loved playing. he wrote and composed the music for his band
column15: a gentlemans sport. he was very creative and active. he loved snowboarding
column16: going to the lake and doing various water sports
column18: and golfing. he also enjoyed cooking and was very good at it. but above all
column19: he loved spending time with his friends and family. he will be remembered for his big heart
column20: and the kindness and thoughtfulness he showed to everyone he came into contact with. in addition to his parents and step-mother he is survived by the love of his life vanessa sypolt; step-siblings; tabatha and mitchel baker; maternal grandmother: joyce nowlin; paternal grandmother: iva vernon; aunts and uncles: teressa and joe fralic
column22: patty and russel zollinger and family; mike and lori hiatt and val and jim ericson; numerous cousins; and his brothers in music: timothy cross
column24: joseph welsh and jeremiah price. also he is survived by his beloved pets mamma and peter. he was preceded in death by his paternal grandfather
column25: gene vernon and his maternal grandfather dana nowlin. cremation services will be provided by . a celebration of life will be held on friday
column26: june 12th at the backwaters of cheat lake at 5:00 pm. in lieu of flowers
column27: donations may be made in tyler's memory to p. u. r. r. west virginia
